title: Creamy Garlic Chicken
instructions: Season chicken with salt and pepper and sear in butter until golden.
Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.
Pour in cream and simmer until slightly thickened.
Stir in parmesan, adjust seasoning, and garnish with parsley.

title: Avocado Toast Deluxe
instructions: Mash avocado with lemon juice and salt.
Spread on toast; top with tomatoes, chili flakes, and olive oil.

title: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
instructions: Chop vegetables and mix with quinoa.
Dress with olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Crumble feta on top and serve.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Cream butter and sugars, then beat in eggs and vanilla.
Mix in dry ingredients and fold in chocolate chips.
Scoop onto baking sheet and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 10–12 minutes.
